message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO 

This paper deals with generating animations from natural language sentences, which involves understanding both language and pose. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper mentions applications in robot motion planning, which suggests that it could also belong to the robotics (cs.RO) sub-category.
